title: Jonna Idly/ Dosa | Two in one batter | Gluten free
content:
Breakfast recipe: Jonna Idly Servings: 35 idlies ~approx Jowar Idly is healthy, tasty and rich in fiber a good way to start your day with these yummy 😋 Idlies. Just 2 main ingredients to make batter and it’s easy and simple to make at home 🏡 Health Benefits of Jowar:
  • High in fiber
  • Helps to loss weight
  • Rich source of protein
  • Packed with essential Minerals and Vitamins
  • Good for Diabetics
  • It is Gluten-free
Duration: 6 hours to soak + 10 hours to ferment + 12 mins to cook Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Jonnalu / Jowar - 2 cups - 320 gms
  • Urad dal - 1 cup - 160 gms
  • Methi / Fenugreek seeds - 1 teaspoon
  • Salt - 1 teaspoon
  • Baking soda - 1/4 tsp
Procedure:
  • Soak urad dal+Methi seeds and Jowar in separate bowls
  • Wash twice and add fresh water and soak for 6 hours
  • Grind them separately and pour in deep bowl.
  • Add salt, Combine well and let it ferment for 10 hours
  • Batter fermented well, once again mix the batter by adding baking soda
  • Pour batter in Idly mold and cook them for 12 minutes
  • Serve hot with Garlic Chutney or you can checkout other Chutney recipes list given below
  • Happy Cooking 😃 Have a great day 🌸
